overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, focusing on research related to computational social science, disinformation, and information operations. His LinkedIn profile boasts the largest follower base, while engagement varies across platforms.

contentThemes.description: Focuses on sharing research findings, publications, and methodological discussions related to computational social science.
Deals with detecting and analyzing disinformation campaigns and coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media.
Announcements related to research grants, job openings for postdoctoral researchers and PhD students.

recommendations: Diversify content formats to include videos and infographics to increase engagement.
Increase posting frequency on Mastodon to build a stronger presence.
Engage more actively with followers by responding to comments and questions on LinkedIn and Bluesky.

platformInsights.bluesky: Bluesky sees good repost activity, indicating potential for virality with engaging content. Focus on visually appealing content and trending topics.
platformInsights.mastodon: Mastodon has the lowest engagement compared to other platforms. Experiment with different posting times and content formats to improve visibility and interaction.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn shows the highest engagement, likely due to its professional focus. Continue to share research updates and job opportunities, and foster discussion within the comments section.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.

Now hiring: Two postdoctoral researchers to join our team working on computational methods for social media analysis. Background in data science, computational social science, or related fields preferred.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
